definition: mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
to mortgage/to pawn/to detain in custody/to escort and protect/(literary) to sign

sentences.english: A prisoner was attempting to escape from a tower.
sentences.chinese: 一个囚犯企图逃离关押他的塔。

sentences.english: The residents were resettled and church services were held in the Convent.
sentences.chinese: 居民被重新安置和教会服务，被关押在女修道院。

sentences.english: Japanese-Americans were rounded up and interned during World War II.
sentences.chinese: 第二次世界大战期间，日本裔美国人遭到集体关押。

sentences.english: Bonus again being held up, and will Wenzhan after three days.
sentences.chinese: 花红再次被关押了起来，并且将要在三天以后问斩。

sentences.english: The judge said there was not enough evidence to keep the five in jail.
sentences.chinese: 该法官称没有足够的证据继续关押这五人。

sentences.english: Zhu is being held without bond at the Montgomery County Jail.
sentences.chinese: 朱海洋正被关押于蒙哥马利县监狱，并不得保释。

sentences.english: who had been imprisoned in the Bastille for twenty years.
sentences.chinese: 这个贵族已在巴士底狱被关押了20年。

sentences.english: In the eighteenth, her plea for clemency was granted.
sentences.chinese: 在关押了十八年之后，她请求宽恕得到了批准。

sentences.english: Many people were locked up - sometimes even killed or driven to suicide.
sentences.chinese: 许多人被关押，有时甚至被杀害，或者逼迫自杀。

sentences.english: But the ideals were stifled by Cixi and Guangxu was jailed in his own palace.
sentences.chinese: 但是，理想扼杀慈溪和光绪被关押在自己的宫殿。

sentences.english: This scripture has always been held in the greatest veneration in Mahayana countries.
sentences.chinese: 这经文一直关押在大乘佛教国家的最大的尊敬。

sentences.english: Police are now on the lookout for these boat thieves.
sentences.chinese: 这群盗船贼现在关押在警察局。

sentences.english: Then there is an area for people arrested for other crimes.
sentences.chinese: 还有一个区是关押其他罪犯的。

sentences.english: Some are unjustifiably detained for years.
sentences.chinese: 有些人无法律依据被关押多年。

sentences.english: I did not expect to be detained by the KMT in Xi'an, held in Xi'an reformatory.
sentences.chinese: 没想到在西安关卡被国民党扣留，关押在西安感化院。

sentences.english: Finally, Garfield and Louis arrive at the Telegraph Tower where Odie is imprisoned.
sentences.chinese: 加菲和路易斯终于来到了关押奥迪的电报大楼。

definition: to detain/to take into custody/to imprison temporarily
in custody/to keep sb in detention
